name: Order Of The Gatekeepers
detailed_description:
The deepest Tower Defense game to date, Order of the Gatekeepers provides players with a massive amount of possible builds and interactivity.

Features:
  • 45 Towers complete with 110 unique abilities
  • 70 Items to upgrade the strength of your Towers
  • 12 Builder Specialties to change the behavior of your Towers
  • 4 Difficulty levels that change the mechanics of the game allowing anyone to have fun
  • Online Co-Operative play with up to 8 players
  • Singleplayer campaign to challenge solo players with different scenarios
  • Fully featured Level Editor, the same one used to make the Official Levels!

Made as a passion project from a love of the Tower Defense genre, the game was designed from the ground up to encourage critical thinking & experimentation. With endless possible Tower, Item, & Builder combinations every match can be a different experience!

short_description: The deepest Tower Defense game to date, Order of the Gatekeepers provides players with a massive amount of possible builds and interactivity. Featuring 45 Towers with nearly 110 abilities to use, 70 items to upgrade them with, and 12 builder specialties to ensure no two matches play out the same.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti or RX 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
